interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Milk, Eggs, and Water "

progression.synopsis: Sensei joins Haruka at Sara 's bar, and finds that she has had quite a lot to drink. While Sara is away getting Sensei a drink, Haruka talks about Sensei's decision to accept or turn down sex with Sara. Later, Haruka tells them both that she's going to stay the night with Sara to avoid driving home â€” the three of them spend the evening getting drunk and (apart from Sensei) talking about feelings. Haruka passes out, and Sara eventually goes to bed. When Sensei wakes Haruka, she kisses him, looks horrified, apologises, and hurries upstairs.
trivia: Your interaction with Drunk-Haruka will vary based on your relation with Sara.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
